original_text: And their rims were tall and awesome, and the rims of all four were full of eyes all around.
korean_text: 그 둘레는 높고 무서우며 그 네 둘레로 돌아가면서 눈이 가득하며

sentences.original_text: And their rims were tall and awesome
and the rims of all four were full of eyes all around
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 넷 모두의 테두리는 사방에 눈으로 가득했습니다
